instructions: During checkout, tap the Apple Pay button. Review the payment information. You can change the credit card, shipping address, and contact information. Complete the payment: On an iPhone with Face ID: Double-click the side button, then glance at iPhone to authenticate with Face ID, or enter your passcode. On an iPhone with a Home button: Authenticate with Touch ID or enter your passcode.

Tap Settings > Sounds & Haptics (on some older devices, tap Sounds ). In the Sounds and Vibration Patterns section, tap Ringtone . On the Ringtone screen, choose a ringtone that came with the iPhone. If you want to buy new ringtones, tap Tone Store (on some older models, tap Store in the upper-right corner, then tap Tones ). If you've never downloaded and installed ringtones, learn how to buy ringtones on the iPhone . Alert Tones are normally used for alarms and other notifications but can be used as ringtones. Tap a ringtone to play a preview of it. When you find the ringtone you want to use as the default, place a checkmark next to it. To go back to the previous screen, tap Sounds & Haptics in the upper-left corner or click the Home button to go to the home screen. Your ringtone choice is saved automatically.

Tap Settings . Tap Sounds & Haptics (or Sounds ). Turn on either the Vibrate on Ring or Vibrate on Silent toggle switch (or both). In the Sounds and Vibration Patterns section, tap Ringtone . Tap Vibration . Tap the pre-defined options to test them or tap Create New Vibration to make your own. To select a vibration pattern, place a checkmark next to it. Your choice is automatically saved.
